statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 23 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 12 , 2 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 4 \, x + 4 , -3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 2 , 5 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 6 , -x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
